document.full_text: a former leader of the shiite muslim community in trinidad and tobago was found guilty on thursday of taking part in a conspiracy to bomb new york's john f. kennedy international airport.
document.title: jury convicts jfk airport bomb plot suspect
lines_and_colors: a former leader of the shiite muslim community in trinidad and tobago was found guilty on thursday of taking part in a conspiracy to bomb new york's john f. kennedy international airport.
